definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: What did you mean by saying that?
sentences.chinese: 你說那話兒是什麼意思？

sentences.english: Tyrion flicked the last drops off and tucked himself away.
sentences.chinese: 提利昂尿完最後一滴把那話兒收好。
